void.string: Calls creature to fight for you.
One or more creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

As summon nature's ally I, except that you can summon one 6th-level creature, 1d3 5th-level creatures of the same type, or 1d4+1 lower level creatures of the same type. When you use a summoning spell to summon an air, chaotic, earth, evil, fire, good, lawful, or water creature, it is a spell of that type. 6th Level
* Dire bear * Elemental, Large * Shambling mound * Tendriculos * Unicorn [chaotic good] * Xorn, Medium-size
